channel.title: Error while spawning (client freezes)
channel.description:
Well when i try to spawn a custom item on my deobbed client it freezes me
Here is the error on the batch file: [code] Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 14098 at Class8.method198(Class8.java:214) at Class8.method200(Class8.java:2620) at client.method105(client.java:8136) at client.method36(client.java:1601) at client.method102(client.java:7859) at client.method9(client.java:8716) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:126) at client.run(client.java:4487) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]
Tbh idk what i did wrong just please help me figure out :)

item.title: Error while spawning (client freezes)
item.dc:creator: @eagledude4 eagledude4
item.description:
@eagledude4 wrote:

if(i == 14098) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[4]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[4]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 57280; class8.anIntArray156[1] = 54503; class8.anIntArray156[2] = 54183; class8.anIntArray156[3] = 11200; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 924; class8.anIntArray160[1] = 924; class8.anIntArray160[2] = 924; class8.anIntArray160[3] = 924; class8.anInt174 = 4157; //Inv & Ground class8.anInt181 = 2000; //Zoom class8.anInt190 = 572; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = 0; class8.anInt194 = 1; class8.anInt165 = 4180; //Male class8.anInt200 = 7177; //Female class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.anInt199 = -1;//noteable class8.aString170 = "Agility Cape(t)"; class8.aByteArray178 = "Its A Agility Cape(t)".getBytes(); }

Try this. If it doesnt work, then its not the cape that’s the problem.

item.title: Error while spawning (client freezes)

item.description:

It should be fine. Its a skillcape

class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear";
class8.anIntArray156 = new int[4];
class8.anIntArray160 = new int[4];
class8.anIntArray156[0] = 57280;
class8.anIntArray156[1] = 54503;
class8.anIntArray156[2] = 54183;
class8.anIntArray156[3] = 11200;
class8.anIntArray160[0] = 924;
class8.anIntArray160[1] = 924;
class8.anIntArray160[2] = 924;
class8.anIntArray160[3] = 924;

class8.anInt181 = 2000; //Zoom

class8.anInt198 = 0;
class8.anInt204 = 0;
class8.anInt169 = 0;

class8.anInt165 = 4180; //Male
class8.anInt200 = 7177; //Female
class8.anInt175 = -1;
class8.anInt197 = -1;

class8.aByteArray178 = "Its A Agility Cape(t)".getBytes();
